verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Great is
Thy faithfulness!
Great is
Thy faithfulness!
Morning by morning
new mercies I see;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
All I have needed
Thy hand hath provided:
Great is
Thy faithfulness,
Lord, unto me!

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
Thou changest not
Thy compassions,
they fail not;
As thou has been
Thou forever wilt be.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Summer and winter,
and spring-time
and harvest;
Sun, moon, and stars
in their courses above

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Join with all nature
in manifold witness
To Thy
great faithfulness,
mercy, and love.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Pardon for sin
and a peace
that endureth,
Thy own dear presence
to cheer and to guide;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Strength for today
and bright hope
for tomorrow:
Blessings all mine,
with ten thousand beside!
